summary: REQ-1 and REQ-2 appear implemented: Header uses BrandLogo in a left-aligned flex group, and an authenticated-only, non-interactive animated watermark layer is added behind dashboard content. REQ-3 is only partially met because the scrolling background references a hardcoded asset path in CSS rather than the centralized BRANDING.logo.src (and the new background component imports BRANDING but does not use it). The diff summary also indicates several unrelated UI/feature changes not requested in the BuildRequest.

missing_requirements.requirement: Header logo and authenticated scrolling background should both reference the same centralized logo source (preferably BRANDING.logo.src) and be served as static assets.
missing_requirements.reason: The scrolling background image is hardcoded in CSS to `/assets/generated/xoroots-logo.dim_300x100.png`, and the added AuthenticatedScrollingLogoBackground component imports BRANDING but does not use it, so the background is not clearly driven by BRANDING.logo.src as required.

hallucinated_features.description: Profile setup modal behavior changed with a loading timeout safeguard and additional session-restoration loading UI logic.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-1/2/3; BuildRequest explicitly lists non-goals around auth/session behavior and does not request profile-setup logic changes.

hallucinated_features.description: Large set of unrelated feature/style changes across many components (attachments metadata support, image cropper, job board dark mode updates, landing page redesign, dashboard tab navigation changes, etc.).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-1/2/3; BuildRequest non-goals include no landing page redesign beyond ensuring the watermark applies only to authenticated pages.

hallucinated_features.description: Footer updated with caffeine.ai attribution/UTM tracking and analytics hostname-based identifier.
Global theme/color system changes (OKLCH palette) and broader typography styling beyond the watermark CSS.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-1/2/3; only watermark/background and header logo placement were requested.
